owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository without the `.git` extension. The name is not case sensitive.

base.description: The name of the base branch that the head will be merged into.

head.description: The head to merge. This can be a branch name or a commit SHA1.

commit_message.description: Commit message to use for the merge commit. If omitted, a default message will be used.
